name: h3
description: The 2026 Easton Hype Fire Drop 5 USA Baseball Bat is a game-changer for serious players seeking a balanced swing feel. Certified by USA Baseball, this two-piece composite bat features a 2 3/4 inch barrel diameter and showcases a striking green, yellow, and pink colorway. Designed for both contact and power hitters, it boasts a 3D Ropecoil Composite that wraps 360° around the barrel’s sweet spot, enhancing performance across the entire barrel. The Connexion Max elastomer connector minimizes vibrations for an optimal feel, while the Opti-Flex Handle is tailored for elite travel ball athletes. Enhanced with a Flow Tack grip and Power Boost Soft knob, this bat ensures exceptional comfort, feel, and control. Warranty chevron-down chevron-down chevron-down Warranty A Full Manufacturer's Warranty of 365 Days is included. If a warranty issue arises, our Bat Experts are happy to assist you in reaching the manufacturer to get a fast replacement! Begin Your Claim Here: Start My Warranty Claim
features: 3D Ropecoil Composite : 3D Composite rope wrapped 360° around the barrel’s sweet spot to expand performance across the entire barrel
Connexion Max : Elastomer connector to eliminate vibration for optimal feel
Opti-Flex Handle : Engineered by size for elite travel ball athletes
Enhanced Grip & Feel : Flow Tack grip & Power Boost Soft knob for comfort, feel, & control
